question: Keshubhai Patel, who recently passed away, was the Chief Minister of which state?
explanation:
Former Gujarat chief minister Keshubhai Patel, who had tested positive for coronavirus, has passed away at the age of 92.
He served as the Chief Minister of Gujarat in 1995 and from 1998 to 2001. He also served as the member of Gujarat Legislative Assembly six times. He founded his own political party ‘Gujarat Parivartan Party’, which was later merged with BJP.
